Uses of Package
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client

  • Packages that use com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client 
    Class and Description
    ClientStart
    This Class is the used to connect to an launched ServerStart.
    InvocationHandlerProducer
    This interface is like a Factory, for creating a JavaRemoteInformationInvocationHandler.
    JavaRemoteInformationInvocationHandler
    This is the proxy, which is used for the RMI API.
    RemoteAccessBlockRegistration
    This Class contains information about requests to the Server.
    RemoteObjectAccess
    This interface provides a way of getting RemoteObjects.
    RemoteObjectFactory
    Implementations will create RemoteObjects.
    RemoteObjectHandler
    This interface says that the Object implementing it handles RemoteObject requests.
    Sender
    This interface is the bridge between Server and Client.
